Source code

  1. 'use strict';

  3. ‌‌module.exports = function throttle (fn, boundary) {
  4.   var last = -Infinity;
  5.   var timer;
  6.   return function bounced () {
  7.     if (timer) {
  8.       return;
  9.     }
  10.     unbound();

  12. ‌    function unbound () {
  13.       clearTimeout(timer);
  14.       timer = null;
  15.       var next = last + boundary;
  16.       var now = +new Date();
  17.       if (now > next) {
  18.         last = now;
  19.         fn.apply(this, arguments);
  20.       } else {
  21.         timer = setTimeout(unbound, next - now);
  22.       }
  23.     }
  24.   };
  25. };
